problem.markdown:
42,51,49,58,56,...

>>If the pattern in the list above continues, what will be the next number after 56?<< = 65 [explanation] The pattern is +9, -2 as applied to N or there are two sequences each increasing by 7 each time.
problem.p: If the pattern in the list above continues, what will be the next number after 56?

formulaequationinput.label: If the pattern in the list above continues, what will be the next number after 56?

problem.p: The pattern is +9, -2 as applied to N or there are two sequences each increasing by 7 each time.
